description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
        Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
Features
PDFNET-41029	Change the text color in rectangle area
PDFNEWNET-36551	Gradient Fill feature

Enhancements
PDFNEWNET-38076	How to get width of text dynamically

Execeptions
PDFNEWNET-36775	HTML to PDF conversion throws ArgumentNullException
PDFNEWNET-38241	PDF to PDFA conversion throws InvalidCasException
PDFNEWNET-40442	OutOfMemory when using OptimizeResources method
PDFNEWNET-37336	PDF to XPS - IndexOutOfRangeException during conversion
PDFNEWNET-37136	Exception while converting Dynamic XFA to Standard AcroForm

Bugs
PDFNET-41273	PDF to PDF/A_3b - Process takes too much time.
PDFNEWNET-37690	Incorrect measurement of replacement fragment while adjusting text with character spacing leads to extra space.
PDFNET-41240	Fix internal System.FormatException during text extraction with 'fast' procedure of GroupProcessor.
PDFNEWNET-40332	Arabic text is not being center aligned in a table cell
PDFNET-41570	Image squished instead of moving to next page
PDFNET-41529	PDF to PDF/A - Text Rotated and overlapping on last page
PDFNEWNET-39151	PDF to PDF/A - PDF/A conversion metadata errors
PDFNET-41553	Image rendering difference in old and new generator
PDFNET-41260	Not all contents are appearing in PDF document
PDFNET-41568	KeptWithNext feature is causing content to disappear
PDFNEWNET-40539	Images missing in resultant file when using 'OptimizeResources'
PDFNEWNET-38607	PDF to HTML - A ligature is shown incorrectly in HTML
PDFNEWNET-36926	USPSIMB standard barcode font shows extra spaces
PDFNET-41309	PDF to HTML: rendering issue of form fields
PDFNET-41308	PDF to DOCX: footnote is not rendering as a single paragraph
PDFNET-41359	PDF to DOC: Paragraph indent values
PDFNEWNET-37932	Import of annotations from XFDF to PDF
PDFNEWNET-40091	PDF to PDFA2b: Converting PDF, generated from Aspose.Cells, to PDFA2b fails the compliance
PDFNEWNET-39327 PDF split to pages is slower in v10.7.0
PDFNET-41585 When PDF is saved as DOCX, OutOfMemoryException occurs.
PDFNEWNET-38005 Glyph widths information lost when forming font for replacement
PDFNET-41339 When PDF converted to PDF_A_1B, the first page is missing some elements.
PDFNET-41340 When PDF converted to PDF_A_1B, the output file returns an error in Acrobat Reader
summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
